title: Tuláčik
description: Tuláčik's Safe Haven is a non-profit animal shelter dedicated to providing a safe and loving environment for abandoned and abused animals. title: Bobáčik
description: Bobáčik's Animal Sanctuary is a unique haven for senior and special needs dogs. At Bobáčik's Animal Sanctuary, we celebrate the wisdom and charm that come with age and seek to find forever homes or loving foster families for our senior companions.

title: Ňufáčik
